transcript:
Customer: [inaudible] number aapke pass [inaudible]
Executive: Hello.
Customer: Hello.
Executive: Mukesh sir good afternoon main Richa baat kar rahi hu IndiaMART se kaise hain aap?
Customer: And 65000.
Executive: Sir aapki services chal rahi hai IndiaMART ke sath aapna hi hota.
Customer: Hmm.
Executive: Iska sir aapki jo services thi uska renewal pending tha sir.
Customer: Hmm.
Executive: To kaise karayenge sir do saal ka karayenge teen saal ka karayenge is baar.
Customer: Mere trade India mein bhi call aaya tha to dekhta hu kabhi decide karta hu unse karta hu ya aap se karta hu.
Executive: Sir yaha pe aap do saal se profile chala rahe hain.
Customer: Do saal ki aapki listing hai sari cheeze hain ab aap soch rahe hain do saal baad aap ise band kara kar ek fresh start karne ki soch rahe hain.
Executive: Hmm hmm hmm.
Customer: But aisa kyu soch rahe hain sir aap?
Customer: Are isme bahut sare hamare yaha local ke jude hue hain jisme hamare pass lead hamare pass aati hai wo unke pass bhi aa jati hai to fir usse thoda confuse hote hain.
Executive: Sir ek minute nahi sir main aapko ek baat bata deti hu IndiaMART mein IndiaMART aur trade India mein yahi cheez yahi cheez to bahut difference hai.
Executive: IndiaMART ki ek bylist mushkil se panch ya se panch logo ko mil paati hai isiliye sare log complain karte hain ki lead fold out ho jati hai aur trade India pe kabhi aisa nahi hota ek lead sabko bati hai waha.
Customer: Hmm.
Executive: To IndiaMART aur trade India mein ye bahut bada difference hai kyuki humse log yahi kehte hain ki trade India mein hame ek lead sare logo ko bati hai aap aap limited logo ko kyu dete ho to ye to bahut hi bada difference hai.
Customer: But abhi yaha pe kab tak decide karenge aap sir?
Customer: Samay do mujhe dekhte hain.
Executive: Sorry.
Customer: Samay do mujhe sochte hain.
Executive: Sir samay to de denge lekin fir bhi kuch idea to denge na aap matlab ki kab tak aap bata payenge.
Customer: Soch samajh ke hi denge idea jo bhi ho soch samajh ke denge unse baat kar lenge ek baar kya cheez mein kya hai.
Executive: Aap unse bilkul baat kariye.
Customer: Hai na aap bilkul unse baat kariye dekhiye usme koi problem nahi hai aapko sab jagah baat karni chahiye.
Executive: Chalo theek hai aapke lekin yaha pe sir fir bhi kuch matlab dekhiye sir hum end ke kab tak hold karaenge aapki profile bhi na.
Customer: Dekhte hain ab kya rehta hai package mein unka kya dete hain wo agar kitni chhut dete hain kya hai fir aapka udhar dekh lenge jaise mera man hi idhar kam hai bahut kya.
Customer: Hai na.
Executive: Sir wo theek hai lekin aap ye to bataenge na hum aapki kab tak profile hold karaenge sir ye koi long matlab aisa to ho nahi sakta ki sir iski koi deadline hi na ho kisi cheez ki.
Customer: Dekhte hain Vijay bol to diya maine.
Executive: Sir aapne ye to ek baar bhi nahi bataya na ki kab tak dekhenge aap yahi bata rahe hain bas dekhte hain ye to bataiye kab tak dekhna hai.
Customer: Dekhte hain unse baat kar lenge.
Executive: Char din panch din do din ek din kuch to hoga.
Customer: Hum aapse kab connect karu dobara.
Customer: Waise hamare vacant chutti ka din hai aaj mujhe itna busy mat karo theek hai mujhe ek achcha ha kyuki mil nahi paati hamare kya hai ki busy kam roj rehta hai na jane kya kya kam aa jate hain aur aaj hamari chutti hai shop ki to aaj mere ko thoda relax hone do chhodo mujhe aaj hai na.
Executive: Theek hai sir fir main aapse ek baar kal parso mein connect kar lijiye.
Customer: Ha theek hai.
summary:
Concerns:

- Customer wants to decide between IndiaMART and TradeIndia.

- Feels local competitors get the same leads.

- Wants to know how long profile can be held.



Resolution:

- Executive explained the difference between IndiaMART and TradeIndia.

- Executive agreed to hold the profile for a while.



Next Steps: 

- Executive will connect in a day or two.



Alert (If Any):

None

@@@Sentiment:

- Neutral -> Neutral



@@@Key Topics:

- tradeindia, buyleads, renewal, profile
